module.exports = { "id": 743, "date": "2022-09-19T13:36:48", "date_gmt": "2022-09-19T13:36:48", "guid": { "rendered": "https://www.payleap.com/?page_id=743" }, "modified": "2022-10-10T14:44:21", "modified_gmt": "2022-10-10T14:44:21", "slug": "merchants", "status": "publish", "type": "page", "link": "https://www.payleap.com/who-we-help/merchants/", "title": { "rendered": "Merchants" }, "content": { "rendered": "

Merchants

Merchants

One Stop For Merchants … Surprisingly Easy and Affordable

Merchants have plenty to worry about, but PayLeap takes the worry out of payment processing. Whether you need a simple PayLeap landing page or a complex integration with your website or mobile app, PayLeap has the tools to make it happen.

At PayLeap we are focused on small and medium sized merchants. As a result, we’ve worked hard to make our system easy to use, including 24\xD77 live support to get you through the shallows. Our system is no vanilla payment processing solution. In addition to payment processing, PayLeap provides online invoicing, elaborate reporting and social media tools to help your customers spread the word about you. Only PayLeap provides an internet PIN debit solution, which enables millions of consumers to pay using the debit card and PIN. Debit cards are the most popular form of electronic payment and PaySecure\xAE\xA0PIN debit is far cheaper for the merchant than credit or signature debit payments.

LeapLock Hosted Payments

A hosted or iframe payment page using PayLeap LeapLock technology lets you get going with minimal development and no PCI compliance headaches. Cut and paste some text into your website and you can take mobile payments. LeapLock hosted pages figure out what device the consumer is using and serve up appropriately formatted content for that device, making the purchasing easy no matter what the device your customer uses.

Get going fast with LeapLock

Using LeapLock is the fastest way to implement mobile payments and avoids the need for PCI compliance.

Get Rolling With Your Favorite Shopping Cart

If your website uses any of the major third party shopping carts, using PayLeap is a matter of updating a few settings in your shopping cart software. Within the software you can capture credit card information yourself or choose LeapLock, in which case you don’t have to worry about PCI compliance.

Only PayLeap enables your shopping card to accept PIN debit payments

With a PayLeap enabled shopping cart your customers get access to PayLeap’s unique PaySecure\xAE\xA0PIN debit technology, enabling them to pay online using their debit card and PIN.

Roll on your own with PayLeap APIs

PayLeap provides a comprehensive API and a variety of SDKs that enable you to tightly integrate your website or mobile app with PayLeap’s payment technology. While more complex, a complete PayLeap integration gives you incredible flexibility to customize the purchase experience on your mobile app or website. And our SDKs mean 80% of your work is probably already done.

Bring worldwide PaySecure\xAE internet PIN Debit to your mobile app or website

Only PayLeap offers your consumers the option to pay on their mobile device using their debit card and PIN. And not just U.S. consumers. Our technology can process PIN payments from millions of consumers outside the U.S. who have PIN debit cards, but often don’t have credit cards.

Facebook Twitter Envelope Plus-square
See a Live Demo Now!

Start Processing
Payments Today!
